thread.section_title: Colorado Pen Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Colorado Pen | www.coloradopen.com | 2 of 72
thread.title: Marilee

author: Marilee
title: Marilee
text: I ordered a couple of pens for my boss for his birthday. I was working on a deadline and got a message one of the pens was on backorder. I was worried it might not make it for his birthday, but both arrived in plenty of time. When I opened one of the pens, there was no ink cartridge in the pen. I emailed them and immediately received a response to look in the bottom of the box and there it was. I was very impressed with their customer service and the quality of the pens.
